mapper.select: SELECT help_id, user_id, appeal_id, help_status, completion, efficiency, attitude, avg_completion, avg_efficiency, avg_attitude, additional_coin, end_time FROM tb_help WHERE help_id=#{helpId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_help( appeal_id, user_id, help_status, completion, efficiency, attitude, avg_completion, avg_efficiency, avg_attitude, additional_coin, end_time) VALUES (#{appealId},#{userId},#{helpStatus},#{completion}, #{efficiency},#{attitude},#{avgCompletion},#{avgEfficiency},#{avgAttitude},#{additionalCoin},#{endTime})
